"widgetTree":[{"$widgetId":"27.S.Chawla.layoutGrid1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid1 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid container-fluid","content":[{"$widgetId":"27.S.Chawla.layoutGrid1$row0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"27.S.Chawla.layoutGrid1$row0$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-12","content":[{"$widgetId":"27.S.Chawla.container1","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container1","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"27.S.Chawla.layoutGrid2","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid2 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid","content":[{"$widgetId":"27.S.Chawla.layoutGrid2$row0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"27.S.Chawla.layoutGrid2$row0$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg-9 col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"27.S.Chawla.text1","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text1","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Mr. Ajoy Chawla"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h1"}},{"$widgetId":"27.S.Chawla.text2","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text2","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Chief Executive Officer- Jewellery"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h6"}},{"$widgetId":"27.S.Chawla.text3","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text3","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Ajoy is currently the Chief Executive Officer of Titan’s Jewellery business that houses iconic brands such as Tanishq, Mia, Zoya and CaratLane. The Jewellery business today has a network strength of 500+ exclusive retail outlets in 220+ town with a strong digital presence for all the brands and an extensive manufacturing and geographically dispersed sourcing network in India. He is on the Board of Caratlane Trading Pvt Ltd, a subsidiary of Titan company ltd.

Prior to this role, he was responsible for Strategy & New Business Incubation at Titan for 5 years and was tasked with nurturing and launching Titan’s new businesses Fragrances (Brand SKINN) & Indian Ethnic Women’s Wear (Retail brand TANEIRA).

Ajoy has also led watch business within Titan, responsible for driving P&L of domestic & international businesses (Titan Biz unit). His role included expansion into Asia while profitably growing the business managing a portfolio of product brands: Titan, Raga, Xylys, Zoop, etc and a Retail brand: Titan World, India’s largest chain of specialty watch stores.

He has lived the life of an Intrapreneur: besides launching fragrances and sarees, he has a successful record of incubating new businesses for Titan, including HELIOS, a multi-brand premium retail chain; FASTRACK sunglasses, accessories; and International Licensed brands

As a leader, Ajoy has led large and diverse teams across geographies, acting as a mentor for many people in his team and for many managers within the Tata group."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}]}},{"$widgetId":"27.S.Chawla.layoutGrid2$row0$column1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg-3 col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"27.S.Chawla.container2","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container2","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":null,"ariaHidden":false}},{"$widgetId":"27.S.Chawla.container3","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container3","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":null,"ariaHidden":false}},{"$widgetId":"27.S.Chawla.container5","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container5","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":null,"ariaHidden":false}},{"$widgetId":"27.S.Chawla.container4","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container4","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":null,"ariaHidden":false}},{"$widgetId":"27.S.Chawla.staticImage1","widget":"Image","props":{"class":"mx-name-staticImage1","alternativeText":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":""},"args":{}}},"responsive":true,"source":{"$type":"StaticImageProperty","image":{"uri":"img/Forms$Images$MrAjoychawla.jpg?638847326674334486"}},"onClick":null}}]}}]}}]}}],"ariaHidden":false}}]}}]}}]}}],"listenTargets":[]
